channel.title: anki on IT技术分享
channel.description: Recent content in anki on IT技术分享

item.title: Anki服务器搭建
item.description: 服务器搭建 export ANKI_SYNC_DATA_DIR=~/anki-sync-server-docker-data mkdir -p "$ANKI_SYNC_DATA_DIR" docker run -it \ --mount type=bind,source="$ANKI_SYNC_DATA_DIR",target=/app/data \ -p 27701:27701 \ --name anki-container \ -d \ kuklinistvan/anki-sync-server:latest 创建用户 # docker exec -it anki-container /bin/sh /app/anki-sync-server # ./ankisyncctl.py --help usage: ./ankisyncctl.py <command> [<args>] Commands: adduser <username> - add a new user deluser <username> - delete a user lsuser - list users passwd <username> - change password of a user
